product_name: The North Face Isotherm WS Tights - Women's
long_description: Although your legs are pumping and driving you forward on winter trails, your lower half still requires the protection of The North Face Isotherm WS women's pants with Gore WINDSTOPPER(R) fabric. Windproof and water-resistant GORE WINDSTOPPER tights offer lightweight coverage from strong gusts of wind and moderate rainfall. Wicking FlashDry(TM) stretch knit panels are body-mapped to keep you dry during aerobic activity by managing moisture in the areas that you sweat the most. Fabric mapping delivers optimum temperature regulation in gender-specific thermal zones to keep you more comfortable during long-distance Nordic ski sessions. Rear easy-access, zippered pocket secures energy gels or car keys, and an internal pocket stores a card or ID. Reflective ankle zippers make it easy to step into pants while wearing running shoes. Articulated knees; reflective logo; silicone gel at leg openings for grip. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Isotherm WS pants for women are part of the Flight Series(R) collection.
